meanings.definition: Phytoplasmas: small bacteria that lack a cell wall and are responsible for various plant diseases.
meanings.sent1: Farmers worry about phytoplasmas harming their crops.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study phytoplasmas to understand plant diseases better.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous phytoplasmas played hide and seek among the flowers.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of plant health, phytoplasmas are the invisible troublemakers.
meanings.sent5: The presence of phytoplasmas can turn a flourishing garden into a wilting wasteland.
